summary: Website-to-APK style app/website with a preloader screen shown on each app open (initial launch only).
architectural_notes: Preloader should display on each app open/initial launch only, and must not trigger on internal page/route changes; keep existing animation/timing unchanged.

existing_features.title: Update the app-level preloader gating so the existing animated preloader displays on every fresh app open/load, but never on internal route/page changes within the SPA.
Preserve the current preloader animation timing and visuals exactly as implemented in FirstLaunchPreloader, including the Z → I → Z → O reveal sequence and fade-out behavior.
Remove or replace the current persistent 'first launch only' localStorage behavior (key: 'app-first-launch-complete') so it no longer prevents the preloader from showing on subsequent app opens.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show the existing preloader every time the user opens the app (initial launch only; not on internal page/route changes) and keep current timing/animation unchanged
